body_html:
Hi, I am seeing this on TitanX maxwell with both 375.66 and 378.13
I use tensorflow.
I caught the memory leak in gdb but its totally closed source.
#0 __libc_calloc (n=8, elem_size=32) at malloc.c:3170
#1 0x00007fbbb885a292 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcuda.so.1

#7 0x00007fbbb88f3439 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcuda.so.1

#15 0x00007fbbc2364fed in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so.5
#16 0x00007fbbc1fc4c06 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so.5

body:
Hi, I am seeing this on TitanX maxwell with both 375.66 and 378.13
I use tensorflow.
I caught the memory leak in gdb but its totally closed source.
